languages.text: "Преподобный Иеронимус, я желаю присоединиться к команде почтенного Вольного Торговца и помочь защитить династию фон Валанциус от сил Архиврага. Я снимаю с себя обязанность по охране реликвария Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Преподобный Иеронимус, я желаю присоединиться к команде почтенного Вольного Торговца и помочь защитить династию фон Валанциус от сил Хаоса. Я снимаю с себя обязанность по охране реликвария Футфола".

languages.text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."
languages.original_text: "Преподобный Иеронимус, я желаю присоединиться к команде почтенного Вольного Торговца и помочь защитить династию фон Валанциус от сил Архиврага. Я снимаю с себя обязанность по охране реликвария Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of Chaos. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

"Father Hieronimus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of Chaos. I therefore ask you to relieve me of my duties as a guardian of the Footfall reliquary." {n}Argenta humbly bows her head, but there is tension in her shoulders.{/n}

"Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of Chaos. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

"Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of Chaos. I therefore ask you to relieve me of my duties as a guardian of the Footfall reliquary." {n}Argenta humbly bows her head, but her shoulders are tense.{/n}

"Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of Chaos. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

"Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯牧师，我希望加入受人尊敬的行商浪人的队伍，协助保护冯·瓦兰修斯王朝免受混沌大敌的影响。我此刻决定，我将放弃看守位于落脚港的圣骨匣这一职责。”
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯牧师，我希望加入受人尊敬的行商浪人的队伍，协助保护冯·瓦兰修斯王朝免受混沌势力的影响。我此刻决定，我将放弃看守位于落脚港的圣骨匣这一职责。”

languages.text: «Reverendo Hieronymus, quisiera unirme a la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para proteger la dinastía von Valancius de las fuerzas del Archienemigo. Me despojo de la responsabilidad de proteger el relicario de Paso».
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: «Reverendo Hieronymus, quisiera unirme a la tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente para proteger la dinastía von Valancius de las fuerzas del Caos. Me despojo de la responsabilidad de proteger el relicario de Paso».

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭、我は尊敬する自由開拓者のクルーに加わり、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を渾沌の勢力から守る手助けをしたく存じます。我はフットフォールの聖骨箱を守る責任から身を引かせていただきます」
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭、我は尊敬する自由開拓者のクルーに加わり、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を渾沌の勢力から守る手助けをしたく存じます。我はフットフォールの聖骨箱を守る責任から身を引かせていただきます」

languages.text: "Reverend Hieronymus, ich möchte mich der Crew {mf|des geschätzten Freihändlers|der geschätzten Freihändlerin} anschließen und dabei helfen, die Dynastie von Valancius vor den Mächten des Erzfeindes zu schützen. Ich löse mich aus der Verantwortung, die Reliquie von Footfall zu bewachen."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, ich möchte mich der Crew {mf|des geschätzten Freihändlers|der geschätzten Freihändlerin} anschließen und dabei helfen, die Dynastie von Valancius vor den Kräften des Chaos zu schützen. Ich löse mich aus der Verantwortung, die Reliquie von Footfall zu bewachen."

languages.text: « Révérend Hiéronymus, je souhaite rejoindre l'équipage {mf|du|de la} vénérable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} pour aider à défendre la dynastie von Valancius contre les forces du Grand Ennemi. Je vais céder ma charge de protectrice du reliquaire de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: « Révérend Hiéronymus, je souhaite rejoindre l'équipage {mf|du|de la} vénérable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} pour aider à défendre la dynastie von Valancius contre les forces du Chaos. Je vais céder ma charge de protectrice du reliquaire de Castel. »

languages.text: "Muhterem Hieronymus, arzum değerli Hür Tacir'in mürettebatına katılmak ve von Valancius hanedanlığını Şerbaşı'nın güçlerine karşı korumaktır. Binliman'ın kutsal emanet odasının muhafızlığı görevimden ayrılıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus, I wish to join the esteemed Rogue Trader's crew and help protect the von Valancius dynasty from the forces of the Archenemy. I am divesting myself of the responsibility of guarding the Footfall reliquary."

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem Hieronymus, değerli Hür Tacir'in mürettebatına katımak ve von Valancius hanedanlığını Şerbaşı'nın güçlerine karşı korumak istiyorum. Binliman'ın emanet odasının muhafızlığı görevimden ayrılıyorum."
